SEARCH
Package gw.api.json.mapping

Interface JsonMapper

public interface JsonMapper
Represents a single mapper from within a JSON Mapping file. A mapper is responsible for taking a root object and translating it into output that conforms to the target JSON Schema definition.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    @Nullable JsonMappingProperty
    getAdditionalPropertiesProperty()
    Returns the mapping property declared as "additionalProperties" for this mapper, or null if no such mapper has been defined
    @NotNull String
    getFullyQualifiedName()
    Returns the fully-qualified name of this mapper, including the fully-qualified name of the mapping that contains it.
    @NotNull String
    getName()
    Returns the name of this mapper, i.e. the key used to define it in the mapping file
    @NotNull Map<String,? extends JsonMappingProperty>
    getProperties()
    Returns the Map of JsonMappingPropertys for this mapper, keyed by property name
    @NotNull IType
    getRootIType()
    Returns the IType of the root object that this mapper accepts
    @Nullable JsonSchemaDefinition
    getSchemaDefinition()
    Returns the JsonSchemaDefinition targeted by this mapper, or throws an exception if the mapper's configuration is invalid and the schema definition could not be resolved
    @NotNull TransformResult
    transformObject(@NotNull Object rootObject)
    Equivalent to calling transformObject(rootObject, new JsonMappingOptions() or new JsonMappingOptions().withFilter(null).withThrowOnErrors(true).withAllowSchemaRecursion(false))

    transformObject(Object rootObject, JsonMappingOptions options)
    Transforms the given root object, using these mappings, into a TransformResult object.

    Transforms the iterable root objects, using these mappings, into a List object.

    Equivalent to calling transformObjects(rootObjects, new JsonMappingOptions() or new JsonMappingOptions().withFilter(null).withThrowOnErrors(true).withAllowSchemaRecursion(false))

    Equivalent to calling transformObjects(rootObjects, new JsonMappingOptions() or new JsonMappingOptions().withFilter(null).withThrowOnErrors(true).withAllowSchemaRecursion(false))

  • Method Details

    • getName

      @NotNull @NotNull String getName()
      Returns the name of this mapper, i.e. the key used to define it in the mapping file
      Returns:
      the name of this mapper

    • getFullyQualifiedName

      @NotNull @NotNull String getFullyQualifiedName()
      Returns the fully-qualified name of this mapper, including the fully-qualified name of the mapping that contains it. The name will be of the form <mapping-name>-<mapping-version>#/mappers/<mapper-name>
      Returns:
      the fully-qualified name of this mapper

    • getProperties

      @NotNull @NotNull Map<String,? extends JsonMappingProperty> getProperties()
      Returns the Map of JsonMappingPropertys for this mapper, keyed by property name
      Returns:
      the Map of JsonMappingPropertys for this mapper, keyed by property name

    • getSchemaDefinition

      @Nullable @Nullable JsonSchemaDefinition getSchemaDefinition()
      Returns the JsonSchemaDefinition targeted by this mapper, or throws an exception if the mapper's configuration is invalid and the schema definition could not be resolved
      Returns:
      the JsonSchemaDefinition targeted by this mapper

    • getRootIType

      @NotNull @NotNull IType getRootIType()
      Returns the IType of the root object that this mapper accepts
      Returns:
      the IType of the root object that this mapper accepts

    • getAdditionalPropertiesProperty

      @Nullable @Nullable JsonMappingProperty getAdditionalPropertiesProperty()
      Returns the mapping property declared as "additionalProperties" for this mapper, or null if no such mapper has been defined
      Returns:
      the "additionalProperties" mapping property, if any

    • transformObject

      @NotNull @NotNull TransformResult transformObject(@NotNull @NotNull Object rootObject)
      Equivalent to calling transformObject(rootObject, new JsonMappingOptions() or new JsonMappingOptions().withFilter(null).withThrowOnErrors(true).withAllowSchemaRecursion(false))

    • transformObject

      @NotNull @NotNull TransformResult transformObject(Object rootObject, JsonMappingOptions options)
      Transforms the given root object, using these mappings, into a TransformResult object. Applies JsonMappingOptions.filter If JsonMappingOptions.isThrowOnErrors is true, an exception will be thrown if any transform anywhere in the tree results in errors. If false, the TransformResult object will be returned even if errors are present. If JsonMappingOptions.isAllowRecursion is true, no exception will get thrown even if recursion is found. If JsonMappingOptions.isAllowRecursion is false, an exception will be thrown if recursion is found.

    • transformObjects

      @NotNull @NotNull List<? extends TransformResult> transformObjects(@NotNull @NotNull Stream<?> rootObjects)
      Transforms the given root objects stream, using these mappings, into a List object. If throwOnErrors is true, an exception will be thrown if any transform anywhere results in errors. If false, the TransformResult object will be returned even if errors are present.

    • transformObjects

      @NotNull @NotNull List<? extends TransformResult> transformObjects(@NotNull @NotNull Stream<?> rootObjects, JsonMappingOptions options)
      Equivalent to calling transformObjects(rootObjects, new JsonMappingOptions() or new JsonMappingOptions().withFilter(null).withThrowOnErrors(true).withAllowSchemaRecursion(false))

    • transformObjects

      @NotNull @NotNull List<? extends TransformResult> transformObjects(@NotNull @NotNull Iterable<?> rootObjects)
      Transforms the iterable root objects, using these mappings, into a List object. If throwOnErrors is true, an exception will be thrown if any transform anywhere results in errors. If false, the TransformResult object will be returned even if errors are present.

    • transformObjects

      @NotNull @NotNull List<? extends TransformResult> transformObjects(@NotNull @NotNull Iterable<?> rootObjects, JsonMappingOptions options)
      Equivalent to calling transformObjects(rootObjects, new JsonMappingOptions() or new JsonMappingOptions().withFilter(null).withThrowOnErrors(true).withAllowSchemaRecursion(false))

    • transformObjects

      @NotNull @NotNull List<? extends TransformResult> transformObjects(@NotNull @NotNull Object[] rootObjects)
      Transforms the root objects array, using these mappings, into a List object. If throwOnErrors is true, an exception will be thrown if any transform anywhere results in errors. If false, the TransformResult object will be returned even if errors are present.

    • transformObjects

      @NotNull @NotNull List<? extends TransformResult> transformObjects(@NotNull @NotNull Object[] rootObjects, JsonMappingOptions options)
      Equivalent to calling transformObjects(rootObjects, new JsonMappingOptions() or new JsonMappingOptions().withFilter(null).withThrowOnErrors(true).withAllowSchemaRecursion(false))
